channel.title: General Rackspace Threadless Future on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Rackspace Threadless Future on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Leaving Threadless
item.description: I am leaving Threadless after 4 awesome years. It was super hard to leave a job that taught me so much, helped me grow and was staffed by all of my friends, but I needed to make that leap towards the future. (Here is a nice interview covering all sorts of aspects of my leaving.) I did it, and the future is looking bright. In the next few months, I am going to be helping Rackspace in their cloud computing division.
